Changes to the SDK

Version 4.5.0.0

Added Classes

  • Added DzGroupNode

Version 4.1.0.0

  • Changed DzNode::getLocalBoundingBox() and getLocalOrientedBox() to no longer be virtual. Subclasses now implement the protected virtual methods calcLocalBoundingBox and calcLocalOrientedBoundingBox which DzNode will call during the get methods. Renamed Members
    • Renamed DzAction::updateOnlineHelp() to DzAction::updateInlineHelp()
    • Renamed DzHelpMgr::setOnlineHelp() to DzHelpMgr::setInlineHelp()

Version 4.0.0.0

  • DzPaneAction::getDefaultMenuPath() now returns "&Window/&Tabs" instead of "&View/&Tabs" for consistency with the industry.
  • Changed DzBakerOptions and DzTextureConvertorOptions to inherit from DzRenderOptions. Some methods on DzRenderOptions were made virtual.
  • Changed all instances of DzBakerSettings and DzTextureConvertorSettings to DzRenderSettings.
  • Changed DzMaterial::setTextureConvertShader() to no longer be virtual. It's all handled in DzMaterial, and a subclass shouldn't need to override the behavior. Removed setTextureConvertShader from all subclasses.

Version 3.0.1.0

  • Changed the list and iterator types in dztypes.h to derive from Qt 4 QList and QListIterator classes.
  • Added virtual function to DzShape, rebuildBaseMap( int whichUVSet ) which subclasses can override to provide implementation for rebuilding the uv map on the base mesh of the shape.
  • Added overriden function rebuildBaseMap on DzPolyShape which replaces the base map with the specified uvset.
  • Added DZ_PLUGIN_REGISTRATION_DATA() macro along with DzActivationPolicy, DzNoEvaluationActivationPolicy, DzTrialDaysActivationPolicy, and DzExpirationDateActivationPolicy classes for setting plug-in evaluation period data. 3rd Party Developers will need to contact DAZ 3D at dazserialprefix@daz3d.com to receive an official serial number prefix for their plug-ins if they wish to utilize the DAZ serial number mechanism for their plug-ins.

    Added Classes
  • Added DzActivationPolicy, DzAxisConverter, DzBasicDialog, DzExpirationDateActivationPolicy, DzFileIOPresetWidget, DzNodeListFilter, DzNodeListView, DzPluginMgr, DzPoserJointSphere, DzProgressHold, DzScriptContext, DzTrialDaysActivationPolicy, DzUndoStackLock, and DzWeightMapValues classes.

    Removed Classes
  • Removed DzArgument, DzArgumentList, DzControllerWgt, DzGLContext, DzHelpPane, and DzLabelledSlider classes.

  • Added DzAction::setToolTipWithAcceleratorText(), DzAction::toolTipAcceleratorText()

Version 1.7.1.0

  • The 4-byte class IDs assigned by DAZ have been phased out and replaced by GUIDs. Old source with legacy class IDs will continue to work, but all new classes must use the new GUID paradigm. DAZ will no longer assign class IDs - but now developers will be able to generate their own. See DAZ Studio Class IDs for more information.
  • Added DOM classes to DAZ Script for parsing XML
  • Added DzRenderMgr class to centrally locate render settings
  • Replaced DzActionBar and DzActionBarItem with DzToolBar and DzToolBarItem
  • DzApp::progressCancelled(), DzApp::progressFinished(), DzApp::progressStarting(), and DzApp::progressUpdate() have been added - for controlling progress bars.
  • DzAudioClip::currentPosition, DzAudioClip::filename, DzAudioClip::length, DzAudioClip::openFile(), DzAudioClip::pause(), DzAudioClip::play(), DzAudioClip::reset(), DzAudioClip::rate have been added.
  • Added DzDockWindow::preferredLengthChanged() and DzDockWindow::setLength().
  • Renamed DzDockWindow::getPreferredLength() to DzDockWindow::getLength().
  • Removed DzDockWindow::length.
  • DzElement has been expanded to better support user defined data items.
  • Renamed DzElement::addUserDataItem() and DzElement::findUserDataItem() to DzElement::addDataItem() and DzElement::findDataItem(), respectively.
  • Added DzHierarchyPane::expandSelected(), DzHierarchyPane::closeAll(), DzHierarchyPane::closeSelected(), DzHierarchyPane::expandAll(), DzHierarchyPane::setShowDForms(), and DzHierarchyPane::showingDForms().
  • DzPaneMgr has been expanded to better support activity bars, layouts, and tool bars.
  • Added DzPoserJointParam::beginEdit(), DzPoserJointParam::cancelEdit(), DzPoserJointParam::finishEdit(), DzPoserJointParam::flipped, and DzPoserJointParam::getWeights().
  • Added DzRenderer::imagePrepared() and DzRenderer::renderFinished().
  • Changed several DzRenderOptions functions to properties. For example DzRenderOptions::getAspect() is now accessed as DzRenderOptions::aspect. The functions that have been changed are: getAspect(), getDoubleSided(), getGain(), getGamma(), getImageSize(), getLastRenderImgFilename(), getLastRenderMovFilename(), getLastRenderSerFilename(), getMotionBlurOffset(), getMotionBlurPct(), getPixelFilter(), getPixelSamples(), getRenderImgFilename(), getRenderImgToId(), useGLSL(), and useMotionBlur().
  • Added DzRenderOptions::numRenderers, DzRenderOptions::renderMovFilename, DzRenderOptions::renderMovToId, DzRenderOptions::renderSerFilename, DzRenderOptions::renderStyle, DzRenderOptions::shadingRate, DzRenderOptions::shadowSamples, DzRenderOptions::xFilterWidth, DzRenderOptions::xPixelSamples, DzRenderOptions::yFilterWidth, and DzRenderOptions::yPixelSamples.
  • Removed DzRenderOptions::addRenderer(), DzRenderOptions::getAspectRatio()
  • Added DzScene::renderFinished().
  • Added DzViewportMgr::manipFinished() and DzViewportMgr::manipStarted().
  • Added DzWeightMap::getFloatWeight(), DzWeightMap::isEmpty(), and DzWeightMap::numWeights.
  • Added Date::setTime().
  • Removed DzCheckListItem::CheckBox, DzCheckListItem::CheckBoxController, DzCheckListItem::Off, and DzCheckListItem::On.
  • Added DzOrientedBox3::transform.
  • Removed DzOrientedBox3::rotation, DzOrientedBox3::scale, and DzOrientedBox3::toString().
  • Added DzWSModifier::aboutToBeRemoved(), DzWSModifier::added(), DzWSModifier::currentValueChanged(), and DzWSModifier::removed().
  • Removed DzShaderParameter::ColorType.
  • Removed DzShape::addMap(), DzShape::getMap(), DzShape::getNumMaps(), DzShape::getOwner(), and DzShape::setLabel().

Version 1.7.0.0

  • DzActionBar and DzActionBarItem were replaced by DzToolBar and DzToolBarItem.
  • Added DzRenderMgr class to centrally locate all render settings.

Version 1.5.0.0

  • Many Changes made to the SDK.
  • New geometry type available: DzSubDMesh.
  • DzShape now an abstract base class - DzPolyShape and DzSubDShape are the two implementations currently available in the SDK.
  • DzShape no longer owns uvs for the geometry - these are now owned by DzGeometry.

Version 1.3.1.0

  • All public slots with a return type of float have been modified to return a double, so as to be compatible with DAZ Script (or more accurately, QSA).
  • The DzERCLink class has been expanded to support additional ERC types.
  • DzSpotLight::getOutsideSpreadChannel() has been deprecated, DzSpotLight::getSpreadAngleControl() has been added to take its place.
  • DzLight::getShadowType() and DzLight::getShadowTypeControl() have been added - DzNode::castsShadow() is no longer used by DzDelightRenderer (a DzRenderer subclass) for DzLight subclasses to determine if a shadow pass for the light is required. Instead, the return value of DzLight::getShadowType() is checked to be DzLight::DeepShadowMap, as raytraced shadows do not require a separate pass.
  • DzRenderer::getCurrentNode() has been added.

Version 1.3.0.2

  • Two non working functions were modified: DzMainWindow::doGeometryImport() and DzImportMgr::readGeometry() were changed to take a DzShape** instead of a DzShape*.
  • Dz3DViewport::isCurrent() has been added for checking if a viewport's OpenGL context is the current OpenGL rendering context.

Version 1.2.11.0

  • A base class for custom data, DzCustomData, has been added. DzUserData has been renamed to DzElementData. IDs are no longer required to be passed into the constructor.

Version 1.2.10.0

  • DzVertexShape has been renamed to DzVertexMesh to avoid confusion in the difference between shape objects and geometry objects.
  • DzObject::getCachedGeom() no longer returns a DzPolyMesh pointer, but returns a DzVertexMesh pointer. If you require a DzPolyMesh pointer for your operation (export, geometry traversal, etc) you should be able to change your code to accomodate this quite easily, as shown in the example below. If you do not require access to the faces of the geometry - just make sure that your local variable is a DzVertexMesh pointer, and this change should not affect your code. 
        void oldFunction( DzObject *obj ){
        DzPolyMesh  *geometry = obj->getCachedGeom();
        
        // ... doSomething ...
    }
    
    void newFunction( DzObject *obj ){
        DzPolyMesh  *geometry = (DzPolyMesh*) obj->getCachedGeom();
        
        // use RTTI to make sure the geometry is a DzPolyMesh
        if( !geometry->inherits( "DzPolyMesh" ) )
            return; // wrong type of geometry
        
        // ... doSomething ...
    }
  • DzShape has been abstracted. The new DzPolyShape is the subclass of DzShape that can hold a DzPolyMesh geometry. If you have been creating DzShape objects to add geometry to a scene object - you will need to create a DzPolyShape object instead.
  • In order to streamline the render() functions for scene items, the DzRenderSettings class has been added to encapsulate several parameters that were previously passed individually. Several of the base classes in the SDK (DzNode, DzMaterial, etc) have had their virtual render() functions changed to now take a const DzRenderSettings reference instead of the several parameters that were originally passed in. If you are overriding any render functions, you will need to update them to follow the new function signature.
  • Dz3DSpline has been removed from the SDK project. This was a prototype class, and was not intended for use in the SDK.
  • The getMaxMin() function on DzNaturalSpline has been renamed to getMinMax() (as well as changing argument order to coincide) for consistancy with the rest of the SDK.

Version 1.2.8.0

  • DzObject and DzModifier now track their respective owners - so you can now easily determine the node that a modifier is being applied to, etc.
  • Several changes have been made to the location, arguments and/or return values for methods formerly found on DzRenderHandler - which are now found on DzRenderOptions.
  • The 3Delight libs have been updated (shaders will need to be recompiled).
  • DzWSModifier no longer inherits from DzModifier - this would have enabled world-space modifiers to be added to individual objects.
  • DzModifier and DzWSModifier no longer have modification flags. The only modification of geometry that is allowed in the geometry pipeline is vertex position.
  • The DzDForm classes have been rewritten to improve speed and compatibility with Poser Magnets.

Version 1.2.7.0

  • Changed the getLocal*(), getWS*(), setLocal*() and setWS*() transform functions on DzNode. These functions have now been changed to take/return a DzMatrix3 in place of the DzVec3 for scale. This is due to the fact that Poser applies scaling to items in the orientation space of the node - therefore scaling that is inherited down through the node hierarchy occurs in different spaces and cannot be compiled into a simple 3 component representation.

Version 1.2.6.0

  • Changed DzFloatSlider and DzIntSlider to handle text updates and edits. This means that developers no longer need to write their own code to make to handle displaying the 'usual' numeric values for the sliders. New functionality has also been added to the sliders to turn the text display on/off, as well as setting the sliders to an indeterminate value. Also, the sliders can display numeric values with or without a '' sign.
  • A new slider type, DzEnumSlider, has been added. This slider is derived from DzIntSlider, and instead of displaying numeric values in the text field, it will display custom strings associated with the current value of the slider.
  • The getdefaultGroup method on DzPropertyGroupTree has been renamed, to getDefaultGroup(), to correct a case inconsistancy.

Version 1.2.5.0

  • DzScene::saveLastRender() has been changed to return a QString containing the path of the saved file, instead of returning a bool.

Version 1.2.0.0

  • The enum on DzScene, OpenMethod, previously renamed from DzOpenMethod for consistancy with the other enums in the SDK, had to be reverted (for the time being) due to its use by Bryce 5.5(c). This enum will eventually be renamed again, for the original reason, once the Bryce codebase has been modified.

Version 1.1.0.1

  • The order of this list has been reversed, with the most recent changes being placed near the top.
  • DzPaneAction::getDefaultMenuPath() now returns "&Views/&Tabs" instead of "&Windows" as a result of consolidating the "Views" (now "Viewport Layout") and "Windows" (now "Tabs") menus under a "View" menu, along with the addition of user defined interface layouts under the "Interface Layout" submenu. Likewise, DzPaneAction::getActionGroup() now returns "Tabs" for consistancy.
  • Comments in headers, previously extracted for building SDK documentation, have been removed.
  • DAZ Script documentation has been removed (scripting docs will be separate to the SDK docs).

Version 1.1.0.0

  • Changes/additions have been made to the DzActionMgr class. A few functions were renamed to better reflect their purpose. Amoung the renamed functions are buildMenus and saveMenus, which have been renamed to loadInterfaceFile and saveInterfaceFile, respectively.
  • The enum on DzScene, DzOpenMethod, was renamed to OpenMethod for consistancy with the other enums in the SDK. This enum has also been exposed to scripting, so that script authors can use DzScene::loadScene().
  • The list functions on DzScene (i.e. getNodes, getSelectedNodes) have been renamed (i.e. nodeListIterator, selectedNodeListIterator) to avoid confusion with newly added functions (i.e. getNodeList, getSelectedNodeList) that return a QObjectList for use by script authors.

Version 1.0.20.0

  • Major changes have been made to the property grouping architecture. The DzPropertyGroupMgr class is no longer available - Property grouping is now handled at the DzElement level, rather than globally. DzPropertyGroup now maintains a list of all the properties in its group. DzPropertyGroup objects are now owned by elements, and are specific to those individual elements, this means that one can now use the DzPropertyGroup tree for a DzNode object to easily iterate through all the properties associated with that node, instead of collecting all the node's properties, collecting all the properties on its object, collecting all the properties of modifiers on the object, etc. DzPropertyGroup also now maintains the ordering of properties and subgroups for native file save/load, so that regrouping operations will now keep the order that the user specifies.

Version 1.0.19.0

  • Made DzLight an abstract base class for light types and created the DzDistantLight subclass to provide the funtionality previously provided by DzLight for distant lights.

Version 1.0.13.0

  • Removed the DzNumberPropertyWgt class and replaced it with two new classes: DzIntPropertyWgt and DzFloatPropertyWgt.
  • Changed the way icon files for actions are located. The path for icon files should now be absolute. See the DzAction documentation for more information.

Version 1.0.12.0

  • Added the ability for DzProperty subclasses to specify the widget class that should be used to display them to the user. This means that new DzProperty subclasses can ship with a new DzPropertyWgt subclass that is designed for manipulating that property type. See DzProperty::getWidgetClass() and DzPropertyWgt for more imformation.
  • DzPane subclasses should no longer reimplement getOptionsMenu(). Instead, they should reimplement DzPane::buildOptionsMenu(), which uses the new DzActionMenu class for constructing menus. This new architecture allows for user customization of all interface menus.

Version 1.0.11.0

  • Moved all SDK header files to the 'sdk/include' folder - now only one include path is required for D|S plug-ins.
  • Did away with QT_DLL and DZ_DLL preprocessor symbols. These were redundant since everything except the core itself needed to define them. Now, DLLExport is assumed under windows - plug-ins only need to define a platform specifier (i.e. WIN32 or __MACOSX__) when they are compiled.
  • DzAction constructor no longer takes parameters for the default icon and accelerator. Subclasses that passed these parameters should now reimplement DzAction::getDefaultAccel(), and DzAction::getDefaultIconFile().

Version 1.0.10.0

  • Added a description text block to DzPlugin
  • Changed the plug-in definition macros:
    • DZ_PLUGIN_DEFINITION() now only takes one parameter - the name of the plug-in
    • DZ_PLUGIN_AUTHOR() a new macro for setting the author string for the plug-in
    • DZ_PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION() a new macro for setting the description text for the plug-in
    • DZ_PLUGIN_VERSION() a new macro for setting the version of the plug-in
  • DzViewToolAction, DzSaveFilterAction and DzPaneAction now generate the menu text and description automatically, using the name of the corresponding item. The constructors for these classes now no longer take the text and description parameters.
